N

nCards - Variable in class blackjack.Hand
number of cards in the hand
nDealtCards - Variable in class blackjack.Shoe
Number of cards already dealt since the last shuffle
nDecks - Variable in class blackjack.Game
Number of decks in the shoe (needed for the debug mode, where the number of decks is computed while reading the shoe file and returned by the shoe object.
nDecks - Variable in class blackjack.Shoe
Number of decks in the shoe
nDecks - Variable in class cardCounting.HiLo
Number of decks that compose the shoe
next_bet - Variable in class cardCounting.StandardStrategy
Saves the bet to be made next
nHands - Variable in class blackjack.Player
Number of hands
noHandsLeft - Variable in class blackjack.Game
Flag so that the dealer knows if there are still any hands in play before it's turn, that is, if any of the player's hands hasn't busted or surrendered (or, in other words, if there is any hand that stands).
